name: Gakuen Alice: Waku-waku Happy Friends
storyline: There are rumors that Gakuen Alice will disappear. In order to prevent this, we will save money in the piggy bank. The method of saving is to synthesize items collected in forests, create items, and submit them to the auction. All items that can be synthesized are specially made by firefly. You can make ketchup bullets, Pigler No. 3, pengie badges, etc. that appear in the original. You can make many other items without getting bored. There are events from previous GBA game such as the Kurigo rice competition as well.
summary: Gakuen Alice: Waku Waku Happy Friends is a Nintendo DS gamee based of the anime Gakuen Alice.
